API_Description: Saves a copy of the PDF document for offline access.
API_Description_Reason: The method name 'saveOfflineCopy' suggests that it is used to save a version of the document that can be accessed without an internet connection.
Returns: A boolean indicating whether the operation was successful.
Returns_Reason: Typically, save operations return a boolean to indicate success or failure, allowing the calling code to handle any errors or confirm the action.
